definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable id="ammoCount" type="Number">ammoCount</variable><variable id="ammoChecked" type="Boolean">ammoChecked</variable></variables><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><comment h="80" pinned="false" w="160">Duplocate this to make another weapon reload procedurejust place the new block right under this one and add the new weapons in the OR item in main hand above</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="compare_mcitems"><comment h="80" pinned="false" w="160">Specific reload procedure for each weapon, I suggest duplicate this if block and use it for a new weapon reload</comment><value name="a"><block type="entity_iteminhand"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value><value name="b"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:Revolver32</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="call_procedure"><field name="procedure">DontShootOnDropItem</field><next><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"/><comment h="80" pinned="false" w="160">checks if damage of gun is greater than 0, usually it would be like damage is 12 11 10 and so on but minecraft counts it as 0 being no damage until the max damage of the item. the else resets timer and reload to false for another gun meaning the gun in main hand is at max condition or reloaded :)</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">GT</field><value name="A"><block type="item_get_damage"><value name="NUM">0</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"/><value name="IF0"><block type="entity_has_item_inventory"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><value name="item"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:Thirtytwoammo</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="entity_nbt_num_get"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">timer</field></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">10</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="item_set_damage"><value name="item"><block type="entity_iteminhand"><value name="entity"><block
